Video Caption: The Jamaican Bobsled | 2022 Beijing Winter Olympics | The Hottest Things On Ice
Comment:
I grew up (and still live) an hour and a half from Calgary. I was only 7 during the '88 Olympics, but I remember the Jamaican bobsled team and the instant celebrity status they had during that time. Those gentlemen set a perfect example of sportsmanship and inspired many people around the world through their sheer determination. 
I'm happy to see that they're continuing to inspire future generations.
